data.name: ChipSizeError
data.value: Image file doesn't fit into chip size.

data.name: CloseDuringUpdate
data.value: Please wait for firmware update process to complete.

data.name: FileNotExists
data.value: File does not exist.

data.name: FWUpdateFailedMessage
data.value: Firmware update failed.

data.name: FWUpdateSuccessMessage
data.value: Firmware was updated successfully.

data.name: InvalidImageFile
data.value: Selected file is invalid. Please select a valid image file.

data.name: MessageBoxCaption
data.value: Thunderbolt(TM) Firmware Update Utility

data.name: NoEPStringPart0
data.value: There is no usable Thunderbolt(TM) device connected to the system

data.name: SWNotInstalled
data.value: Thunderbolt(TM) UWD software is not installed. Please install the Thunderbolt(TM) UWD software and run the tool again.

data.name: ValidationFailedPart1
data.value: Firmware image does not match current hardware:

data.name: LoadControllersFailed
data.value: Failed to load Thunderbolt(TM) controllers.

data.name: InvalidControllerID
data.value: The provided controller ID is invalid.

data.name: NoDeviceStringPart2CMD
data.value: Then connect Thunderbolt(TM) device and retry.

data.name: NoDeviceStringPart2GUI
data.value: Then connect Thunderbolt(TM) device and press OK to retry or press Cancel to abort firmware update process.

data.name: MaskIsntSupported
data.value: Mask isn't supported for data with length > 1.

data.name: OutOfControllerSection
data.value: Requested property is out of controller section; probably an issue with the tool.

data.name: OutOfFileSection
data.value: Requested property is out of file section; probably a corrupted or incompatible file.

data.name: UnknownChip
data.value: Unknown Thunderbolt(TM) chip.

data.name: RedwoodNotSupported
data.value: DSL4000 series controllers are not supported by this firmware update tool

data.name: GetFirmwareVersionFailed
data.value: Error while getting the firmware version

data.name: ReadFirmwareFailed
data.value: ReadFirmware function failed

data.name: ServiceDoesntExist
data.value: Thunderbolt(TM) service doesn't exist

data.name: IncompatibleHWGeneration
data.value: Firmware image file is not compatible with controller hardware generation

data.name: IncompatiblePortCount
data.value: Firmware image file is not compatible with controller port count

data.name: NoHWInfo
data.value: Hardware information is not available

data.name: NoEPUpdateSupport
data.value: This controller doesn't support device firmware update

data.name: DeviceNotSupported
data.value: This device doesn't support device firmware update

data.name: InvalidDeviceUUID
data.value: The provided device UUID is invalid.

data.name: LoadDevicesFailed
data.value: Failed to load Thunderbolt(TM) devices.

data.name: EPUpdateNotSupported
data.value: This controller doesn't support device firmware update

data.name: NoControllerStringPart0
data.value: No active Thunderbolt(TM) controller found in the system

data.name: NoDeviceStringPart1
data.value: or Thunderbolt(TM) software is not present in the system. Make sure you have Thunderbolt(TM) software installed.

data.name: PdMismatchError
data.value: The controller and the file differ regarding PD existence (one of them has it and one doesn't)

data.name: CommandNotFound
data.value: Command not found

data.name: CommandTableError
data.value: Error in command finding (probably an error in command table)

data.name: DromMismatchError
data.value: The controller and the file differ regarding DROM existence (one of them has it and one doesn't)

data.name: ImageForHostError
data.value: The image file is for host controller

data.name: IncorrectArgumentCount
data.value: Wrong number of arguments for this command

data.name: NoCommandSupplied
data.value: No command supplied

data.name: NoDromInFileError
data.value: The file doesn't include DROM section

data.name: NoDromWarning
data.value: Warning: no DROM existing (no vendor/model check)

data.name: ModelMismatchError
data.value: The image file is for another product model

data.name: VendorMismatchError
data.value: The image file is for another vendor product

data.name: ValidationFailedPart2
data.value: Please supply a valid image file.

data.name: SafeModeError
data.value: This command is not supported on controller in safe mode

data.name: ImageForDeviceError
data.value: The image file is for device controller

data.name: MinimalValidationInSafeMode
data.value: Only minimal validation was done to the image file because the controller is in safe mode

data.name: ReadI2CFailed
data.value: Error while reading an I2C register

data.name: WriteI2CFailed
data.value: Error while writing to an I2C register

data.name: GetPdVersionFailed
data.value: Error while getting the PD firmware version

data.name: HostNeedsPowerDownMessage
data.value: The new PD version on your machine is different from the previous PD version. In order to complete the upgrade you must put your computer in G3 mode (shut down completely and unplug).

data.name: DeviceNeedsPowerDownMessage
data.value: The new PD version on your device controller is different from the previous PD version. In order to complete the upgrade you must disconnect and unplug the device.

data.name: MultipleImagesFound
data.value: Multiple files found

data.name: CommandNotSupportedOnDevice
data.value: Command is not supported on devices

data.name: NoMatchingDeviceFound
data.value: No matching devices found

data.name: SafeModeWarning
data.value: Not all Thunderbolt(TM) ports are functioning properly. Some controller's information is not available.

data.name: DeprecatedMethod
data.value: The command is deprecated

data.name: I2CAccessNotSupported
data.value: I2C access is not supported

data.name: InvalidArgument
data.value: One or more of the provided arguments are invalid

data.name: DromNotFound
data.value: No DROM found

data.name: NativeModeMismatch
data.value: Native/BIOS-Assisted mode mismatch between the controller and the image file

data.name: AuthFailed
data.value: The image provided is not signed. Therefore rejected.

data.name: DriverCommunicationError
data.value: Got an error while communicating with the UWD driver

data.name: ImageWriteError
data.value: There was an error during firmware update. Please make sure device stays connected and the image is signed.

data.name: FWUpdateTimeout
data.value: A timeout has expired while FW update was performed.

data.name: DriverAPIUnknown
data.value: Driver API unknown

data.name: MultiHandleOpenDuringFWUpdate
data.value: More than one handle open during FW Update

data.name: UnsuportedOperation
data.value: The operation is not supported
